short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjusts Formatting of Wiki Pages for better readability

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension modifies wikipedia webpages to:
- limit the horizontal space
- turn the page to dark mode
for better readability, especially on large screens.

No tracking, no ads.
